wikitext.*:
{{expansion}}
The '''Inwir''' was the royal clan of the [[Vanyar#Other versions of the legendarium|Teleri]], according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''. They were the kindred, or house, of [[Inwë]].<ref>{{LT1|LinkC}}, p. 50</ref>

== Etymology ==
The name ''Inwir'' is in [[Qenya]], meaning the "kindred of Inwë" according to [[Paul Strack]].<ref>{{LT1|Index}}, entry "Inwir"</ref>

Its [[Gnomish]] cognate was '''''Imrim''''', also appearing as '''''Imrin''''', and it contains the plural suffix ''-[[rim]]''.<ref>{{PE|11}}, p. 32</ref><ref>{{PE|14}}, p. 6</ref>
